title: MythicMobs插件指定世界生成问题！
author: qq2913467007
txt_content:
就是无法生成怪物！我很苦恼！    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []

我用MV禁止原版怪物生成应该没有影响吧！
[mobs]
cs:
  Type: ZOMBIE
  Display: '&c僵尸&6&8&c'
  Health: 30
  Damage: 15
  LegacySkills: 
  Drops: 
  - money 100 
  Equipment: 
  Options: 
  - AlwaysShowName: true 
[RandomSpawns]

TestRandom:
  Mobname: cs 
  Worlds: cj 
  Chance: 0.1 
  Priority: 1 
  SpawnMethod: replace
  Conditions: 
    - outside true

服务器核心:PaperSpigot-1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-latest

replies.author: qq2913467007
replies.txt_content: Chance: 0.1 把刷怪速度调为1嘿嘿嘿！
